import React from 'react' import './hero.css' import Title from '../../common/title/Title' const Hero = ()=>{ return ( <>
<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Ex, delectus ipsa? Aliquid, accusamus. Veniam ab cumque aspernatur voluptatibus odit sapiente sunt, in ex obcaecati quibusdam, culpa eaque adipisci consectetur. Ea!</p> <div className='button'> <button className='primary-btn'> GET STARTED NOW <i className='fa fa-lon-arrow-alt-right'></i> </button> <button> VIEW COURSE <i className='fa fa-lon-arrow-alt-right'></i> </button> </div> </div> </div> </section> <div className='margin'></div> </> ) } export default Hero
